Building Services

The Building Services Department is in charge of construction permits, business permits and inspections for Horizon City. For questions, please call 915-852-1046. We are currently using the
[IRC 2009 Code](http://shop.iccsafe.org/media/wysiwyg/material/3100S09-toc.pdf)

##### **For inspections, please call 915-852-1875. Inspections or cancellations MUST be called the day BEFORE by 4:00PM.**

#### ***[Online Application Portal](https://twn-horizoncity-tx.smartgovcommunity.com/Public/Home)***
